'''''Amon Hen'' 191''' is the one-hundred-and-ninety-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[January]] [[2005]].

* Cover: ''[[Huorn]]''
** By: Chris Leaper

* Announcements

** By: Malcolm Lindley
* Dates for your Diary
* Emergency Repairs at [[Perrott's Folly]]

* [[Tolkien Reading Day]] suggestions
* AGM & Annual Dinner Announcement
* The [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Opening Gambit
** By: ''[[Berúthiel|Beruthiel]]'s Pet''

** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]

** By: Helen Armstrong

** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* Member Profile
** By: Juan Carlos Delgado Expósito
* Report: Hobbiton 11
** By: Martha Zammit
* [[Mathom]]
** By: Anne Forbes

* Save The Three Cups Hotel
